titleStmt.title: The purifying of vnclean hearts and hands: opened in a sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons, at their solemne fast, January 28. 1645. in Margarets Westminster. / By Richard Vines, one of the Assembly of Divines. Published by order of the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Vines, Richard, 1600?-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Abel Roper, at the signe of the Sun against St Dunstans church in Fleetstreet.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Sun against St Dunstans church in Fleetstreet.
